org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers

Class CloudletSchedulerAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.schedulers.CloudletSchedulerAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, CloudletScheduler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloudletSchedulerSpaceShared, CloudletSchedulerTimeShared

    public abstract class CloudletSchedulerAbstract
extends Object
implements CloudletScheduler
    Implements the basic features of a CloudletScheduler, representing the policy of scheduling performed by a virtual machine to run its Cloudlets. So, classes extending this must execute Cloudlets. The interface for cloudlet management is also implemented in this class. Each VM has to have its own instance of a CloudletScheduler.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getCurrentMipsShare

        public List<Double> getCurrentMipsShare()
        Description copied from interface: CloudletScheduler
        Gets the list of current mips capacity from the VM that will be made available to the scheduler. This mips share will be allocated to Cloudlets as requested.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentMipsShare in interface CloudletScheduler
        Returns:
        the current mips share list, where each item represents the MIPS capacity of a Pe. that is available to the scheduler.

      • updateCloudletsProcessing

        protected void updateCloudletsProcessing(double currentTime,
                                         Processor p)
        Updates the processing of all cloudlets of the Vm using this scheduler that are in the cloudlet execution list.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - current simulation time
        p - a Processor created from a mipsShare list with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler

      • updateCloudletProcessing

        protected void updateCloudletProcessing(ResCloudlet rcl,
                                        double currentTime,
                                        Processor p)
        Updates the processing of a specific cloudlet of the Vm using this scheduler.
        Parameters:
        rcl - The cloudlet to be its processing updated
        currentTime - current simulation time
        p - a Processor created from a mipsShare list with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler
        See Also:
        updateCloudletsProcessing(double, org.cloudbus.cloudsim.resources.Processor)

      • cloudletExecutionTotalLengthForElapsedTime

        protected long cloudletExecutionTotalLengthForElapsedTime(ResCloudlet rcl,
                                                          double currentTime,
                                                          Processor p)
        Computes the total length of a given cloudlet, in number of Instructions (I), that has been executed since the last time cloudlets processing was updated. This length is considered as the sum of executed length in each Cloudlet PE.
        Parameters:
        rcl -
        currentTime - current simulation time
        p - a Processor object created from a list with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler
        Returns:
        the executed length of the given cloudlet, in number of Instructions (I)
        See Also:
        #updateCloudletsProcessing(double, java.util.List)

      • timeSpan

        protected double timeSpan(double currentTime)
        Computes the time span between the current simulation time and the last time the scheduler updated the processing of it's managed cloudlets. The method manages to correct precision issues of double values math operations.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - the current simulation time
        Returns:

        protected Processor getProcessor(List<Double> mipsShare)
        Gets a Processor object from a list of MIPS capacity available for the scheduler.
        Parameters:
        mipsShare - list with MIPS share of each PE available to the scheduler
        Returns:
        a Processor object

      • updateVmProcessing

        public double updateVmProcessing(double currentTime,
                                 List<Double> mipsShare)
        Description copied from interface: CloudletScheduler
        Updates the processing of cloudlets running under management of this scheduler.
        Specified by:
        updateVmProcessing in interface CloudletScheduler
        Parameters:
        currentTime - current simulation time
        mipsShare - list with MIPS share of each Pe available to the scheduler
        Returns:
        the predicted completion time of the earliest finishing cloudlet, or 0 if there is no next events

      • getProcessor

        protected Processor getProcessor()
        Processor object created every time the processing of VMs is executed. It represent the last CPU capacity assigned to the scheduler.
        Returns:
        See Also:
        updateVmProcessing(double, java.util.List)
